messages.subject: UPDATES - FYI
messages.msgSnippet: Due to server upgrades over the past few days, most of the updates mentioned in this month s recent updates sort of disapeared.... however, the page is now
messages.messageBody:
Due to server upgrades over the past few days, most of the 'updates'
mentioned in this month's 'recent updates' sort of disapeared....
however, the page is now oficially updated, with all the links in the
previous email now good and current.

Thanks,

C.E. West
